settings.title: Settings
brand.name: MoveIt
seo.home.title: MoveIt - Mouse Jiggler for macOS, Windows & Linux | Keep Computer Awake
seo.home.description: Free mouse jiggler for macOS, Windows & Linux. Prevent sleep during presentations, testing & long processes. Smart scheduling keeps your computer awake automatically.
seo.home.keywords: mouse automation, macOS, Windows, Linux, productivity, remote work, screen sharing, software testing
seo.contact.title: Contact - MoveIt Mouse Jiggler Support
seo.contact.description: Contact Nicolae Balica, developer of MoveIt mouse jiggler. Get support, report bugs, request features, or contribute to this free cross-platform mouse automation tool. Open-source on GitHub.
seo.contact.keywords: contact, support, Nicolae Balica, developer, GitHub, email
seo.download.title: Download MoveIt - Free Mouse Jiggler for macOS, Windows & Linux
seo.download.description: Download MoveIt mouse jiggler for free. Available on Mac App Store or direct download from GitHub. Keep your computer awake automatically with this free cross-platform mouse mover app.
seo.download.keywords: download MoveIt, macOS, Windows, Linux, Mac App Store, direct download, mouse automation
seo.default.keywords: mouse automation, productivity, macOS, Windows, Linux, utility, workflow
seo.author: Nicolae Balica
home.hero.title: MoveIt
home.hero.subtitle: Mouse Jiggler & Auto Mouse Mover
home.hero.description: Keep your computer active during important workflows: remote presentations, software testing, long-running processes, and remote desktop sessions.
home.features.title: Key Features
home.features.scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
home.features.scheduling.description: Set custom active hours to automatically move your mouse only when you need it. Configure daily schedules with start and end times for each day of the week.
home.features.scheduling.altText: Schedule settings interface showing customizable work hours for each day of the week
home.features.respects.title: Respects Your Schedule
home.features.respects.description: MoveIt only activates during your configured schedule periods. Outside these times, your Mac behaves completely normally.
home.features.respects.altText: Real-time status indicator showing when MoveIt is actively monitoring your schedule
home.features.wakeFromSleep.title: Continues After Sleep
home.features.wakeFromSleep.description: MoveIt automatically resumes operation when your computer wakes from sleep, ensuring uninterrupted workflow protection.
home.features.wakeFromSleep.altText: Wake from sleep feature showing automatic resumption when computer wakes up
home.features.multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
home.features.multilingual.description: MoveIt automatically detects your system language and displays the interface in your preferred language. Supports 11 languages out of the box.
home.features.multilingual.altText: Language selection dropdown showing 11 supported languages with automatic system detection
home.features.privacy.title: Privacy First
home.features.privacy.description: Zero data collection. Everything runs locally on your computer. Open-source and transparent about required permissions.
home.features.privacy.altText: Privacy and security dashboard showing zero data collection and local-only processing
home.useCases.title: Perfect For
home.useCases.remotePresentations.title: Remote Presentations
home.useCases.remotePresentations.descri: Keep your screen active during virtual meetings, webinars, and screen sharing sessions.
home.useCases.softwareTesting.title: Software Testing
home.useCases.softwareTesting.descriptio: Prevent screen lock during long-running test suites, builds, and QA processes.
home.useCases.longProcesses.title: Long Processes
home.useCases.longProcesses.description: Keep your Mac active during data processing, uploads, downloads, and rendering tasks.
home.useCases.remoteDesktop.title: Remote Desktop
home.useCases.remoteDesktop.description: Maintain remote desktop connections without interruptions from screen savers or sleep mode.
home.useCases.accessibility.title: Accessibility Support
home.useCases.accessibility.description: Assist users who need alternative input methods or extended time for computer interactions.
home.useCases.dataMonitoring.title: Data Monitoring
home.useCases.dataMonitoring.description: Keep dashboards and monitoring tools visible and active for continuous observation.
home.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
home.cta.description: Download MoveIt today and keep your computer active when it matters most.
contact.hero.title: Get in Touch
contact.hero.description: Questions, feedback, or need support? I'd love to hear from you!

contact.support.privacy.description: Read our {link} to learn about data collection and usage (spoiler: we don't collect any data).
contact.contributing.title: Want to Contribute?
contact.contributing.description: MoveIt is open-source! Contributions are welcome. Whether it's bug fixes, new features, translations, or documentation improvements, your help makes MoveIt better for everyone.
footer.description: Professional mouse automation. Keep your computer active during important workflows.
